text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg Caring for ones child doesn't include a 250 mile drive in a Covid-19 incubation unit. Either neither had it, or they infected their child. I know which option would result in a father playing with the child in the garden while Abba played for the enjoyment of the neighbourhood..
